input: career aspirations and goals, I'm not going to know that. I go to a lot of university career fairs for CGI and one of the most important things that I speak to students about is getting a profile on LinkedIn.
offline_reference: 关于职业抱负和目标，我并不了解这些，但我参加了很多CGI的大学职业招聘会，其中最重要的一点就是我会跟学生们强调要在领英上建立个人资料。
